4_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4.body:
> [cuntwagon](#comment_7_17AcmbLffN1gjfsTf6Jy8K2aBPdMaSBrrf): Would you be interested in automating the process of copying content from sites like Vimeo and YouTube to draw more users in?  I know the amount of data is prohibitive but maybe if users could browse videos from those places and then just click something to download and seed then this place would be more interesting sooner.

I second that: I've been uploading mirrors here at vista.bit and celsius.bit and the frustration is, those mirrors still link to the original sites. It would be great if I could play those videos, seeded, with a non-working ZeroNet proxy and so keep within ZeroNet proper. Synthesizing MDMA may be interesting to some minority somewhere for a very short period of watching/seeding. I'd prefer to see someone 'dance to the beat of water' on celsius.bit, and laugh.

14_12rMePjZCdJVqTaAYf3Dg3fk3bYFfTPDsP.body:
> [weakish](#comment_4_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR): Got "Not Found index.html"

I'm not sure why that happens but you could try dragging the (0) top-right and then click the 'Update' button to see if automatetheboringstuff.bit on your machine updates: that is if you see the (0), otherwise I'm not sure:( - sorry.

31_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body:
> [sirenyc](#comment_148_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ): You can access the site normally?

I'm getting the same problem.

Tried to slide the (0) top-right across to 'Update' the site but it gave me three 'content.json' error messages and did not allow.

Have you siteSign-ed any major changes to your zite? If you've changed the content significantly you may need to siteSign and sitePublish to get it to us.

1_15rVDNb7L1Kpzt3MCvkxFayqfMBw7yPxbk.body: Pull the (0) top-right on your zite and 'Sign' your content.json, 'Publish' and 'Update'. You may also want to publish to peers here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n/
